law.catch_line: Fires to capture or destroy game prohibited.
law.text: No person shall willfully or knowingly set fire to any timberland not his own, or hollow trees or stumps of flammable material on timberland not his own to capture or destroy wild birds or quadrupeds or to destroy feeding or breeding grounds thereon.
law.history: Amended 1966 Ky. Acts ch. 23, sec. 47. -- Created 1964 Ky. Acts ch. 158, sec. 7.
